about.heroDescription: ClubVantage isn't built by software developers who read about clubs. It's built by professionals who've spent over two decades in the trenches—understanding the unique challenges, workflows, and member expectations that make club management fundamentally different from any other business.
about.storyP1: In 1999, we wrote our first line of code for a golf club in Thailand. Back then, most clubs were running on paper ledgers and spreadsheets. We saw an opportunity to bring modern technology to an industry steeped in tradition.
about.storyP2: Over the next 25 years, we built systems for over 150 clubs across Southeast Asia—Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Indonesia, and the Philippines. Each implementation taught us something new about what clubs truly need.
about.storyP3: After 25 years, we knew exactly what clubs need—and what legacy systems can't deliver. In late 2025, we started fresh: AI-first architecture, modern design, built on decades of experience. Now we're looking for founding members to build it with us.
about.milestone1Desc: Started implementing club management systems for golf courses in Thailand.
about.milestone2Desc: Extended services to Singapore, Malaysia, and Hong Kong.
about.milestone3Desc: Expanded to Indonesia and Philippines, serving 150+ clubs.
about.milestone4Desc: Started fresh with AI-first architecture, built on 25 years of experience.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide every feature we build and every decision we make.
about.purposeBuiltDesc: Every feature designed specifically for club operations, not generic business software adapted for clubs.
about.memberCentricDesc: We believe exceptional member experiences are the foundation of thriving clubs.
about.innovationDesc: Continuously pushing boundaries with AI and automation while respecting tradition.
about.regionalExpertiseDesc: Deep understanding of Southeast Asian business practices, compliance, and culture.
about.expertiseList1: Deep understanding of member lifecycle management
about.expertiseList2: Expert knowledge of regional compliance requirements
about.expertiseList3: Proven track record with prestigious clubs
about.expertiseList5: Understanding of club culture and traditions
about.expertiseP1: When you work with ClubVantage, you're not explaining basic concepts like member types, reciprocal arrangements, or seasonal billing cycles. We already understand.
about.expertiseP2: We know why a golf club's tee sheet is different from a simple booking calendar. We understand the nuances of caddie management, member statements, and corporate memberships. We've solved these problems hundreds of times.
about.expertiseP3: This deep domain expertise means ClubVantage anticipates your needs rather than requiring you to adapt to generic software limitations.
about.joinForwardThinking: Join forward-thinking club managers who are shaping the future of club management.

features.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of tools designed specifically for club operations.
features.membershipDesc: Complete member lifecycle management from application to renewal.
features.billingDesc: Automate invoicing, collect payments, and stay tax compliant.
features.facilityDesc: Real-time availability for all facilities with smart scheduling.
features.golfDesc: Purpose-built tee sheet with caddies, carts, and tournaments.
features.auraAiDesc: AI-powered assistant that learns your operations.
features.posRetailDesc: Pro shop sales, inventory management, and member charging.
features.aiMarketingDesc: AI-driven engagement and acquisition marketing campaigns.

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.subtitle: ClubVantage adapts to the unique needs of your facility.
solutions.golfDesc: Purpose-built for the unique needs of golf and country clubs with tee sheet management, handicap tracking, and tournament tools.
solutions.fitnessDesc: Streamline class scheduling, trainer management, and member engagement for fitness facilities of all sizes.
solutions.sportsDesc: Multi-sport facility management with court bookings, league organization, and event coordination.
